tool_description: Monitors SLA compliance and automatically escalates tickets based on priority, elapsed time, and escalation rules.

escalation_type.description: Type of escalation (sla_breach, customer_request, complexity, priority_change)

urgency_override.description: Whether to override normal escalation timelines

notify_customer.description: Whether to notify customer of escalation

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Invalid escalation type: Use one of [sla_breach, customer_request, complexity, priority_change].
Invalid target tier: Use one of [supervisor, manager, director].
Escalation not allowed: Current ticket status does not allow escalation.
No escalation path: No qualified escalation target available for this tier.
usage: Escalate tickets based on SLA breaches, customer requests, or complexity. System will route to appropriate management tier and update all stakeholders.

escalated_to.description: Name/ID of person ticket was escalated to
